column5:
Japan Animator Expo or Japan Anima(tor)'s Exhibition (日本アニメ（ーター）見本市 Nihon Animētā Mihon'ichi) was a weekly series of original net animations released as part of a collaboration between Hideaki Anno's Studio Khara and Dwango, consisting of various anime shorts produced by many directors. The project began release from November 7, 2014 and was streamed worldwide on Niconico.

Missing from Letterboxd:

#20b: "(Making of)evangelion: Another Impact"

#21: "Iconic Field"

#28: "ENDLESS NIGHT"

#30: "The Ultraman"

#31: "GIRL"

#33: "Ragnarok"

column2: Yoshikazu Yasuhiko & Ichiro Itano: Collection of Key Animation Films from Mobile Suit Gundam
20min Walk From Nishi-Ogikubo Station, 2 Bedrooms, Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen, 2mos Deposit, No Pets Allowed.
